name: SJ-19 Learns to Love! Demo
description:
Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1441670/SJ19_Learns_To_Love/


SJ-19 Learns to Love is a short metroidvania about a KILLER ROBOT who learns to love. Fight and explore a mysterious planet while gaining ~EMOTIONAL MATURITY~

** This is a demo for the full game, which releases on Itch and Steam April 23rd! **

  • 100+ rooms to EXTERMINATE in areas like BONE CITY and THE LAB 🌎
  • 9 bosses to battle, including BIG FROG and Steve the Milkman! 💀
  • Items to gain abilities and power, like MILK for some strong robot bones. 🥛
  • Frogs! Lots of them. 🐸
  • Collect SP to upgrade your gun, missiles, and others! 🔫
  • Learn to love! 💕

Will SJ-19 fulfill their destiny as a KILLER ROBOT or learn to love and save everyone?!

🥛💀 Are you BAD enough to defeat STEVE the milkman?! 💀🥛
